Content_wSideColumn.BodyCopy:
What is Best of EFY?

Best of Especially for Youth offers topics of interest to youth. Presentations are delivered by experienced, talented, and spiritual speakers. Presentation topics may include religion, morality, peer pressure, family, dating, courtship, and other subjects.

When does Best of EFY take place?

Best of EFY is a two or three-hour event that takes place at various dates and locations throughout the year. For detailed information on each of the Best of EFY events, see the schedule page.

Participation Requirements

Youth ages 12-18 are invited to attend; although, some locations are limited to 14-18 years old. See flier for specific age information.

Cost Information

The cost to attend a regular two-hour Best of EFY Session is $6. A three-hour Best of EFY Session is $7. The only exception is the campus Best of EFY.

Registration Information

Registration is currently available.

Best of EFY programs will be discontinued as of December 31, 2012.

View the letter for more details.
